name: King Avenir, Josaphat and the Pagan Scholars Behold the Sun God in the Clouds
maker: Follower of Hans Schilling, from the Workshop of Diebold Lauber
description: King Avenir, Josaphat and the Pagan Scholars Behold the Sun God in the Clouds; Follower of Hans Schilling (German, active 1459 - 1467), from the Workshop of Diebold Lauber (German, active 1427 - 1467); Hagenau, Alsace, France (formerly Germany); 1469; Ink, colored washes, and tempera colors on paper; Leaf: 28.6 x 20.3 cm (11 1/4 x 8 in.); Ms. Ludwig XV 9, fol. 222; J.
